Package Assignment3

Class ShowList

java.lang.Object
Assignment3.ShowList
public class ShowList extends Object
The showList class has a private inner class which prevents from any privacy leak of the ShowNode class. The inner class has accessor and mutators method of the node. The showList class has methods like insertion, deletion, replace, find, contains and print to / from the linked list. The inner class has a clone and copy constructor. Equals methods has been overridden in the showList class. There is no privacy leak.
